MIDI2.js Architecture (ASCII)

   +------------------------------+
   |        Application Layer     |
   +---------------+--------------+
                   |
                   v
   +------------------------------+
   |        midi2.js API          |
   +---------------+--------------+
                   |
   +---------------+--------------+
   |  Scheduler + JR Projection   |
   +---------------+--------------+
                   |
   +---------------+--------------+
   |   UMP + SysEx Engine         |
   +---------------+--------------+
                   |
   +---------------+--------------+
   | WebGPU | DSP | ML | Audio   |
   +------------------------------+
